structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

text.section: The provisions of KRS 95.951 to 95.960 shall be in addition to the requirements of KRS 61.300 or any other statute.

The provisions of KRS 95.951 to 95.960 shall not be construed as limiting any city, urban-county, or charter county in the Commonwealth which appoints or employs peace officers or auxiliary police officers from requiring standards of performance stricter than those contained in KRS 95.951 to 95.960.

law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 428, sec. 5, effective July 14, 1992.
